description:
This module is an introduction to collection, management
and data analysis of quantitative surveys in public health
research, with strong emphasis on acquiring hands-on
experience for handling public health data with the STATA
software. It will cover essential concepts such as sampling
and design of questionnaires as well as practical
components such as data storage, management, and
basic statistical analysis of questionnaire data.
title: Collection, Management & Analysis of Quantitative Data
